itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Esquire gonzo journalist A.J. Jacobs to talk about his most famous and outrageous articles including living strictly according to the Old Testament, being brutally honest to everyone for a month, and the time...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Esquire gonzo journalist A.J. Jacobs to talk about his most famous and outrageous articles including living strictly according to the Old Testament, being brutally honest to everyone for a month, and the time he introduced George Clooney to ‘Two Girls, One Cup’ among many, many other ridiculous stories.
